attributes.action: CCTV on Coningree Way/Bannana Walk in Radcliffe, Manchester
attributes.additional_details: Due to a spate of assaults, robberies & a recent sex attack, the people of the Radcliffe Community, surrounding areas & concerned citizens appeal for CCTV & possibly further measures to be put in place around the area of Coningree Way (also known as Bannana Walk) in Radcliffe Manchester.
